title: Spartak Stadium (Novosibirsk)
text:
Spartak Stadium is a <a href="multi-purpose%20stadium">multi-purpose stadium</a> in <a href="Novosibirsk">Novosibirsk</a>, <a href="Russia">Russia</a>. It is currently used mostly for <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> matches and is the home ground of <a href="FC%20Novosibirsk">FC Novosibirsk</a>. The stadium holds 12,500 people.
It is the most easterly venue to have hosted a match in <a href="UEFA">UEFA</a> club competition.
